title: Weekly Roundup: Thursday, March 17
description: This episode, the evolving battle over President Obama's Supreme Court nominee, the latest in the Presidential race, some listener mail, and what the NPR Politics team just can't let go this week — with host/campaign reporter Sam Sanders, campaign reporters Scott Detrow and Sarah McCammon, and political editor Domenico Montanaro. Find the team on Twitter, at nprpolitics.org, or email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
